notesStmt.note: Text breaks denoted by three spaces; The fragment appears to be from a prayer of the Baḳashah type, in which emphasis is put on the limitations and timeliness of man contrasted to the infinity of God. Comparable in content to Saadia's second Baḳashah; Biblical phrases are used: Psalms CXLIV 4 and XXV 6, Job XIV 1.
Condition: slightly damaged, loss in interior edge.
